author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Once again, many leftist politicians would like it if you believed that the riots in Los Angeles have been “mostly peaceful.” However, considering there is this little thing called “social media,” and the fact that nearly all the footage is not what you would call “peaceful,” the American people are not buying it. So, not only is it pathetic when people like Maxine Waters tell you to disbelieve your eyes, it’s insanely delusional.

This is why Speaker Mike Johnson had no choice but to roll his eyes when a reporter asked him about her lies.


🚨 Daily Caller News Foundation reporter @AndiNapier: "What is your reaction to Maxine Waters repeatedly saying that there has been no violence at the LA
title: Speaker Mike Johnson’s eye roll when asked about crazy Maxine Waters says it all

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
One of the most common excuses the left uses to defend illegal immigration is the claim that it’s no different than a DUI or setting off fireworks—minor misdemeanors not worthy of prosecution. However, I’m not sure what version of reality María Elena Salinas is living in, because most sensible people don’t defend criminal behavior by comparing it to driving under the influence. Not only does that comparison make no sense, but it also ignores the fact that both are crimes—and both have resulted in countless lost lives.

So, while we might be tempted to say “nice try” to Salinas, the truth is we can’t—because her argument was a weak attempt to support the idea that “no human is illegal.” This is exactly why Ben Ferguson, whose family was impacted by a drunk driver, said what needed to be said.
title: CNN compares illegal immigration to a DUI, shocking the one conservative at the table: "I've been hit by a drunk driver...

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Trump sent in troops to Los Angeles and Gavin Newsom is not happy about this. However, Trump can and should do this because it’s an insurrection.

Today’s show tells you why.

According to CBS:

About 700 active-duty Marines have arrived in Los Angeles to join National Guard troops who were sent to the city
title: Watch: Los Angeles Riots Push Donald Trump to the Edge of the Insurrection Act

description:

title: Based TikToker goes on brilliant rant why he SUPPORTS the anti-ICE protests... because it's creating more Trump voters

author: Brodigan
description:
Who could have seen this coming? The ICE protests are spreading. It’s almost like this isn’t a grassroots effort and is really funded by Leftist organizations. President Donald Trump sent in the troops and Governor Gavin Newsom is upset, but Trump is allowed to do this because it’s an insurrection. Let us tell you why. Finally, Gavin Newsom is a piece of sh*t. You’ve known that for years. Today, we prove it.

ICE PROTESTS SPREAD

  • Looking for the toughest badasses in the city (los angeles)
title: LA on the Brink: Riots Push Trump to Edge of Invoking Insurrection (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
As is the case with most pro-illegal immigration demonstrations, there are a lack of American flags flown. Odd, because you would think someone here illegally wouldn't fly the flag of the country they are seeking "asylum" from, yet at the anti-ICE riots taking place in Los Angeles, that was the case. At least, until a handful of future Democrat staffers realized the optics problem and handed out American flags because they thought they could con people into thinking they were patriotic.

The goal is to avoid any more in-kind Republican campaign ads like this one.

One day, this photo will define a generation.

Also, the 2028 Democrat Primaries. pic.twitter.com/CuMgziu0ul
— Brodigan (@brodigan)
title: LA anti-ICE rioters realize the lack of American flags is bad optics, so they attempt to do something... but still mess up

author: Brodigan
description:
It's riot season again in America. Well, at least in the Democrat run cities, where progressive billionaires fund their progressive activism through progressive NGOs, knowing that a progressive media lacks any self-respect to report honestly. Out in real America (aka the suburbs), we kick back and enjoy the content. Like this Dallas video, where a cop tries to have a conversation with a masked protester. SPOILER: The protester is an imbecile.

Everyone has their favorite genre of content. Some people prefer the outrage over seeing foreign flags flying over a gathering meant to affect American policy. Others go with the looting, where city folks show how much they care about marginalized communities by stealing sneakers made by slave labor from those marginalized communities. We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website? It's all abou
title: Anti-ICE protester melts down over simple question asked by cop, proves Democrats aren't sending their best and brightest
